`unrar` directory contains unmodified files from
`https://www.rarlab.com/rar/unrarsrc-7.0.9.tar.gz` archive.

The archive itself is available for download from
`https://www.rarlab.com/rar_add.htm`, as "UnRAR release source code".

Unrar source code may not be used to develop a RAR (WinRAR) compatible
archiver. See `readme.txt` and `license.txt` in `unrar` directory for more
details.
